data.message:
Em, I want to work for you. 

I'd sweep the floors, do the chores
Scrub the dishes 
And see out bitches. 

I'd mop and chop fishes
It'd be delicious 
Just grant my wishes. 

Id learn the console 
Analog or digital
Treat each mission critical. 

I'm a pro with tools
And I can run logic
I'm able to do a ton constant. 

Which means ableton is conscious. 

My mic techniques are blumline
Can record snares or drumlines
And I can warp space and time

On a 360 degree axis all I want is access
And if you'd fact check
You'd see I could be an asset

I just want a job and aftermath is my dream place to work.
